Posts.Content: SteveJ wrote: My wife (now in Xeloda cycles as 4th line of defense) has mild to moderate nausea sometimes at night and generally for a long time in the mornings. Very discouraging. Any experience out there with visualization, hypnosis or other similar technique to deal with it? (We are in regular contact with onc and chemo nurses and have tried several drugs) Steve J Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Visualization or Hypnosis for Nausea? SteveJ mason204
